title: Privateer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose to prevent the usage of day abilities tomorrow during the night. (2 uses)
- Choose to withhold public information from the Town tomorrow during the night. (2 uses)
- Choose to disable whispers tomorrow during the night. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Public information includes any system messages that would be produced due to any Town roles (e.g. Mayor reveal, pre-nerf Caroler carol, etc.). This does not include death announcements.
- Your ability will not be publicly announced when you use it. If someone tries to whisper or use a day ability when you have disabled them, they will be privately notified that it was unsuccessful.
- You may only use one of your abilities per night.
- You have a one-use autovest that grants you Basic defense the first time you are attacked.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose the game.
